message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to keep the game going.
I'll try to get a better deal, Alice. This is my first offer.
That's a bit too low, Bob. I'll give you a counteroffer. Let's see if you can do better.
I'll give you a bit more, Bob, but I'm not getting greedy. Take it or leave it.
I'll try to get closer to a fair split, Alice. This is my second offer.
Still a bit too low, Bob. I'll give you another chance to do better.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, Bob. Meet me in the middle or walk away.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal.
Still too low, Bob. You're not getting any younger, and the money's not getting any more valuable.
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob. Time to make a decision.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal, but I'm running out of options.
Alright, Bob, I think we've danced around this long enough. I'll accept your offer. $7600 for me, $2400 for you. It's time to end this.
